この: (kono) - este · o · esse · isto · deste · um · isso · aquele · destes neste desta nesta.
×: (ペケ) - x-mark (used to indicate an incorrect answer in a test, etc.); (ペケ only)  impossibility/futility/uselessness
Φ: (フィー) - phi; (confusion with  (ø), properly prefix read まる, also pronounced パイ) diameter (units assumed, esp. mm)
α-ヘリックス: (アルファヘリックス) - alpha helix
α-リノレン酸: (アルファリノレンさん) - alpha-linolenic acid; ALA
α-ｈｅｌｉｘ: (アルファヘリックス) - alpha helix
αリノレン酸: (アルファリノレンさん) - alpha-linolenic acid; ALA
α分類学: (アルファぶんるいがく) - alpha taxonomy
α化米: (アルファかまい) - cooked and dry packed rice (modern version of hoshii rice); processed quick-cooking rice
α崩壊: (アルファほうかい) - alpha decay
α米: (アルファまい) - cooked and dry packed rice (modern version of hoshii rice); processed quick-cooking rice
α粒子: (アルファりゅうし) - alpha particle
γ-オリザノール: (ガンマオリザノール) - gamma oryzanol
γアミノ酪酸: (ガンマアミノらくさん) - gamma-aminobutyric acid (GABA)
γリノレン酸: (ガンマリノレンさん) - gamma linolenic acid; GLA
π中間子: (パイちゅうかんし) - pi meson; pion
τ粒子: (タウりゅうし) - tau particle; tau lepton
φ: (フィー) - phi; (confusion with  (ø), properly prefix read まる, also pronounced パイ) diameter (units assumed, esp. mm)
※: (こめじるし) - rice symbol; note (supplementary information) symbol; symbol with an "x" and four dots
※印: (こめじるし) - rice symbol; note (supplementary information) symbol; symbol with an "x" and four dots
←: (やじるし) - arrow (mark or symbol); directional marker or indicator
↑: (やじるし) - arrow (mark or symbol); directional marker or indicator
→: (やじるし) - arrow (mark or symbol); directional marker or indicator
↓: (やじるし) - arrow (mark or symbol); directional marker or indicator
△: (さんかく) - average (e.g. as a mark for homework); weak
○: (まる) - circle (sometimes used for zero); (ant: ×・ばつ・1) 'correct' (when marking); symbol used as a placeholder (either because a number of other words could be used in that position, or because of censorship); period/full stop; maru mark/semivoiced sound/p-sound
○×: (まるばつ) - circle and cross; right and wrong (answers); true-false
